scripts.publish-patch: yarn workspace @deanacus/upstart publish --patch && yarn workspace @deanacus/upstart-hooks publish --patch
scripts.publish-minor: yarn workspace @deanacus/upstart publish --minor && yarn workspace @deanacus/upstart-hooks publish --minor
scripts.publish-major: yarn workspace @deanacus/upstart publish --major && yarn workspace @deanacus/upstart-hooks publish --major
